title: Graduate Data Engineer
benefits: Competitive salary with equity and bonus potential; Flexible hybrid work arrangements; Great personal growth and development; Supportive team-based environment
summary: Join Jacobi’s global team delivering an industry-disrupting SaaS platform for portfolio design and analytics.
Work on ETL pipelines, client-specific solutions, and real-time data management with Python, SQL, and open source tools.
Collaborate with colleagues across Brisbane, Sydney, London, and San Francisco.
Contribute to innovative solutions for investment management teams and their clients.
